title: Ultimate Pancakes
description: Best pancakes recipe so far! Takes some time to cook, but worth it.
story:
For a long time I was in search for the best pancakes recipe. In my family we prefer pancakes to be light, flufy and moist inside. So after lots of tries and fails - here it is - so far the best pancakes recipe.

We usually have them with maple syrup and berries. I also like some sour cream on my pancakes.

ingredients.name: kefir
ingredients.preparationNotes: I take one with vanilla flavour
maple syrup, berries, sour cream to serve with

instructions: Dissolve baking soda in a 1/3 of a cup of kefir, leave for a moment aside.
Lightly beat the egg with sugar.
Add 2/3 cup of kefir to egg mixture, mix well. Add melted butter. Mix well.
Add kefir with soda to this mixture.
In a separate bowl mix flour with baking powder and salt.
Now start gradually adding wet mixture to flour. Mix well.
Whisk egg whites till soft peaks.
Start incorporating egg whites to batter.
On a medium heat in a pan lightly greased with olive oil start frying pancakes. You can make any sizes and shapes you like.
When done put on a paper towel.
Enjoy with maple syrup or sour cream.
